objects.specification: A flat rectangular floor panel in a neutral light gray finish with a smooth, slightly textured surface and beveled edges, designed to form a durable exhibition booth base covering an area of six by four meters.
A tall rectangular wall panel in neutral light gray with a smooth matte finish and crisp straight edges, providing a solid backdrop of six meters width and three meters height.
